DOC.criteria: Able wear study lenses parameter available Nonpresbyopes age 1845 Understand sign inform consent Willing follow protocol Achieve least 20/30 ( 6/9 ) visual acuity ( VA ) right eye ( OD ) leave eye ( OS ) study lenses Myopia 0.75 6.25 , cylinder 0.75 1.50 diopter ( D ) ( axis 90 +/ 15 , 180 +/ 15 ) 1.75 D ( axis 90 +/ 10 , 180 +/ 10 ) Adapted soft contact lens wearer Swims week Has wearable pair spectacle . Any ocular systemic disorder may contraindicate contact lens wear Any topical ocular medication Aphakic Corneal refractive surgery Corneal distortion hard CL wear keratoconus Pregnant lactate Grade 2 bad slit lamp sign Infectious disease Previous clinical study within 2 week Do n't agree participate Polymethyl methacrylate ( PMMA ) rigid gaspermeable ( RGP ) lens wear last 8 week Previous adverse effect contraindicate extend lens wear .
